DataElement.preferredName: Patient Principal Investigator Negation Review Pharmacokinetic Effect Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating whether a patient meets the eligibility criteria regarding a principle investigator review of the administration of medications that my affect the study drug pharmacokinetics.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Principal Investigator Negation Review Pharmacokinetic Effect Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._Processes that effect the level of a drug in the body._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Principal Investigator Negation Review Pharmacokinetic Effect Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria

The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.
Processes that effect the level of a drug in the body.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient receiving any medi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any medications or substances known to affect or with the potential to affect the activity or pharmacokinetics (i.e., CYP450, PgP) of any of the study drugs and the PI has not reviewed the case?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any medications or substances with the potential to affect the activity or pharmacokinetics of talazoparib, has eligibility been determined following review by the principal investigator?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is receiving any medications or substances with the potential to affect the activity or pharmacokinetics of AZD1775, has eligibility been determined following review by the Principal Investigator?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is receiving any medications or substances known to affect or with the potential to affect the activity of cabozantinib, has eligibility been determined following review by the Principal Investigator?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is receiving any medications or substances with the potential to affect the activity of CBX-12 or exatecan, has eligibility been determined following review by the Principal Investigator?
